meanings.sent1: In the past quinquenniums, we have seen many changes in technology.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to expand its operations over the next few quinquenniums.
meanings.sent3: During the last quinquenniums, our smartphones became smarter than us!
meanings.sent4: The quinquenniums passed by like a gentle breeze, leaving memories in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The quinquenniums of childhood seem to stretch on forever, filled with endless adventures.

meanings.sent1: The library has a collection of historical documents spanning several quinquenniums.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the trends of different civilizations by analyzing their quinquenniums.
meanings.sent3: The shelves were filled with quinquenniums of dusty old books, waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent4: The quinquenniums of knowledge gathered in the library are a treasure trove for researchers.
meanings.sent5: The quinquenniums of literature in the archives hold stories of the past waiting to be discovered.
